explains: adj. 简短的；小型的；服装超短的
v. 缩写；节略（abbreviate 的过去分词）

sentences.en: Where appropriate, abbreviated forms are used.
sentences.cn: 适当的地方用了缩写形式。

sentences.en: The creators of the original X-Men abbreviated the title of its sequel to simply X2.
sentences.cn: 第1部《X战警》的创作者们把其续集的片名缩写成简单的《X2》。

sentences.en: Charles's letter was indeed published, albeit in a somewhat abbreviated form.
sentences.cn: 查尔斯的信确实被刊登了出来，尽管有些删节。
